name: Serval

ascensionMaterials.itemName: Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow

story: A Belobog mechanic who used to be a researcher for the Technology Division of the Architects.As Gepard Landau's elder sister, her personality stands in stark contrast to her brother's.She loves an ancient form of music known as "rock 'n' roll" that was popular before the Eternal Freeze.

ascensionMaterials.itemName: Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow
Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow
Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow
Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow

skills.name: Roaring Thunderclap
skills.description: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Lightning Flash
skills.description: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single enemy and any adjacent targets, with a high chance of causing Shock.

skills.name: Here Comes the Mechanical Fever
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to all enemies and increases the duration of Shock.

skills.name: Galvanic Chords
skills.description: After attacking, deals a minor amount of Additional DMG to all Shocked enemies.

skills.name: Good Night, Belobog
skills.description: Attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals minor Lightning DMG to a random single enemy, with a high chance to Shock all enemy targets.

eidolons.name: Echo Chamber
eidolons.description: Basic ATK deals Lightning DMG equal to 60% of the Basic ATK's DMG to a random enemy adjacent to the target of the Basic ATK.

eidolons.name: Encore!
eidolons.description: Every time Serval's Talent is triggered to deal Additional DMG, she regenerates 4 Energy.

eidolons.name: Listen, the Heartbeat of the Gears
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Make Some Noise!
eidolons.description: Ultimate has a 100% base chance to apply Shock to any enemies not currently Shocked. This Shock has the same effects as the one applied by Skill.

eidolons.name: Belobog's Loudest Roar!
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: This Song Rocks to Heaven!
eidolons.description: Serval deals 30% more DMG to Shocked enemies.
